review: Works as a perfect replacement for dairy-based Greek yogurt in every recipe I've tried. Delicious with fruit and granola.

title: Tastes like burned almonds
review: Really awful flavor that stays on your tongue.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
name: Furngirl
title: Great sour cream sub
review: This is listed as a Greek Style yogurt. It's not quite as thick as true Greek yogurt but very close. I use this in my smoothies. It's a great sour cream substitute for non-dairy or vegan lovers. It's even a pretty good sub for cream cheese in some recipes. I keep this on hand. It's great for add-ins too.

I canâ€™t imagine trying to mask this with other foods itâ€™s so strong in the worst way. Donâ€™t waste your money.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
name: MJS
title: THIS IS IT
review: This is the best vegan yogurt I've had. I love the taste, texture, and flavorâ€”it's got some FUNK. Lots of Bitter Bettys commenting here that it's the worst vegan yogurt they've had. They're just not ready for this jelly. That's all. More yogurt for you.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
name: Kat Z
title: Tasty Dairy Free Yogurt
review: This is a tasty and delicious dairy free yogurt. I used it to make cucumber yogurt sauce for some falafel I was making.No one really knew the difference. I am glad that we can now make things everyone in my family can eat.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
name: Cynthia Reifler Flores
title: Great taste and texture!
review: This is delicious!!!!! So glad to have found an unsweetened, plain, vegan Greek yogurt!!!!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2021
name: dana ware
title: Closest to Greek style yogurt
review: Great taste and thickness

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
name: Ada
title: Decent macros and great in meals
review: If you want to eat unsweetened yogurt straight out of the tub, I don't know what to tell you. This is sour and strong. It is, however, delicious when used creatively and the macros are pretty good for a vegan greek yogurt; the protein content per serving is actually comparable to dairy greek yogurt and there's more fiber! Stop eating vegan yogurt that's just sugar with no protein, it's a waste of calories!I use this as a healthy vegan sour cream alternative over chili and it tastes great with the other flavors. I also mix it with a sugar free stevia-based "maple" syrup and use it as a decadent pancake topping that tastes like frosting with 0g of sugar. This yogurt is also tasty mixed with chocolate protein powder for a healthy chocolate pudding style breakfast that can be topped with fruits and nuts. Be creative!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2021
name: Douglas Watson
title: Gross Flavor
review: Not really the texture of greek yogurt, and the flavor is horrible. Much preferred the cashew forager yogurt taste, will be going back to that one.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021

title: Not a great replacement for unsweetened yogurt
review: I love Kite Hill but this was a disappointment.This almond milk yogurt was a bit runny and the flavor was awful.Not something I will buy again.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2021
name: E. Sankin
title: It doesn't taste good
review: The texture is fine; it's thick and relatively similar to greek yogurt.The flavor is abysmal.It's no substitute if you eat greek yogurt plain.My child would not eat it, and I only ate her bowl because I hate to waste.I will have to cook with it to hide the flavor and use it up; this is not worth eating as yogurt.Disappointing because Kite Hill sour cream is delectable.I had hopes.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2020
name: Gigi H.
title: Yuck
review: I had high hopes for this product but I found it to be grainy and the flavor was awful.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
name: Ally
title: Thick, Creamy, Dreamy!
review: I HAD to write a review for this yogurt because I have been searching so long.I have looked for plain almond milk yogurt to use to top soup, burritos, and various other things I used to use dairy greek yogurt for before I went vegan.This yogurt is amazing. It is perfectly thick, just like real dairy Greek yogurt, and the taste is very fresh unlike some vegan yogurts that have a strange after taste.Everyone has their own preferences for alternative dairy but I urge you to try this. Itâ€™s amazing and Iâ€™m never going back to anything else. Not to mention it is often on sale at Whole Foods ðŸ¥°
